comments: I\'m the guy who had to take both ACCT 201 & 202 twice, so when I heard that I had to take ACCT 312 I was very nervous. Ling Liu was the most helpful accounting teacher I\'ve ever had. She goes a little fast because there\'s a lot of info to cover but she always waits for questions after teaching. Ask questions! Few HW assignments, Exam heavy grader.

comments: She is a very cute and nice professor. Probably my favorite professor so far. She gives homework but it really only helps your grade.

comments: I experienced a language barrier during this class. The professor is very knowledgeable but I had difficulty understanding her. She was always willing to help clear up any questions but you have to be willing to make the time to go see her or ask questions in class.

comments: Accounting comes easy to me for starters so this class wasn\'t hard. Professor is more than willing to help students and is very helpful when you ask questions. Personally I never listened to lectures or took notes and just read the book and taught myself how to do the assignments. Lectures sometimes seemed directionless. Overall good class.

comments: Accounting is a hard class to begin with-and from what I\'ve heard from other students, Ling is one of the best professors here at UWEC in the subject.She\'s more than willing to help out during office hours, & in class she makes sure everyone understands the material before moving on.This is a hard class-be ready to work for your grade.

comments: It\'s an accounting class, so not bad professor overall. Quite hard to understand at first. Had a pop quiz/in-class hw that quite a few people missed including me that couldn\'t be made up...Get ready to hear "Am I Right?" or "Right?" quite a bit.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Take Liu for accounting 201. Anyone who cannot understand her needs to work listening better, and she is always willing to repeat herself or help if you don\'t understand something. Teaches by example but in this class that is the most helpful way, and she wants you to do well. Homework is pretty easy, study for the tests and you should be alright.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: I thought she did a good job teaching. Examples in class, homework problems, and test problems are all similar. I didn\'t have a problem understanding her.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: She\'s not bad. Class was a cakewalk. I really didn\'t do the reading, just took notes in class and studied the ppts she supplied. Can be a little hard to understand, but truly an intelligent and caring person. Tests were pretty easy, basically right off the homework/quizzes. Some of the hw was a little lengthy though.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Accounting takes some work no matter who your professor is. Liu is a good professor that really wants you to do well in her class. Homework is very easy and helps your grade a lot. Really have to study for tests, but your grade reflects how much you study. I had no problem understanding her, and enjoyed her class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Very easy class, I recommend taking it with her. She teaches will and tries to make all the students understand. Studied an average of 3ish hours for exams and easily got As. Her accent is only hard to understand the first week and then you will get used to it. Look over materials and course will be a breeze.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Very nice lady, but hard to understand. She\'s very considerate about her accent and is always accepting of questions about what she said and always repeated things if we didn\'t understand, but I found it very frustrating at times when I WANT to learn what she\'s teaching but don\'t understand what she\'s saying.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  TEST HEAVY (1)  Tough Grader (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)
comments: Worst class ever. Accounting is hard already and then to top it off she is really hard to understand. Avoid her if you can. She also doesn\'t really teach, she expects you to learn by examples. For the homework assignments, I literally just copied her example problem. Didn\'t learn anything.
